name: lambda-base
description: Base folder structure for Lambda projects

scripts.local-build: npm run package && cd dist && npm i --only=prod
scripts.deploy-lambda: npm run local-build && @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command ./ps-deploy-lambda.ps1 -StackName aws-base -AppPrefix awsbase
scripts.deploy-stack: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name aws-base --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-2 --parameter-overrides StackName=aws-base AppPrefix=awsbase EnableSQS=true ApiVersion=200929-1930
scripts.disable-stack: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name aws-base --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-2 --parameter-overrides StackName=aws-base AppPrefix=awsbase EnableSQS=false ApiVersion=200929-1930
scripts.deploy-appsync: npm run upload-appsync && npm run deploy-stack
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-lambda && npm run deploy-appsync

author: Andy Blackledge
